lechat.name: Le Chat
lechat.description: Mistral AI Le Chat conversation exports

file_area.drop_text_default: Drop ZIP files here or click to browse
file_area.drop_text_gemini: Drop ZIP and JSON files here or click to browse

status_badges.tooltip_new: This conversation is not in your vault
status_badges.tooltip_updated: This conversation has newer content than your vault ({{existing_date}} ‚Üí {{new_date}})
status_badges.tooltip_unchanged: This conversation is the same as in your vault

error.detail: Check the console for more details

conversation_folder.name: Conversation folder
conversation_folder.browse_tooltip: Browse folders or create a new one

reports_folder.name: Reports folder
reports_folder.browse_tooltip: Browse folders or create a new one

attachment_folder.name: Attachment folder
attachment_folder.desc: Where attachments are stored (‚ö†Ô∏è Exclude from sync to save space)
attachment_folder.browse_tooltip: Browse folders or create a new one

add_date_prefix.name: Add date prefix to filenames
add_date_prefix.desc: Add creation date as a prefix to conversation filenames

custom_format.name: Custom message timestamp format
custom_format.desc: Override the default locale-based timestamp format in message headers. When disabled, timestamps follow Obsidian's language setting. If Obsidian is set to english, the US format (YYYY/DD/MM) is enforced.

timestamp_format.name: Timestamp format
timestamp_format.desc: Choose the format for message timestamps in conversation notes

import_attachments.name: Import attachments
import_attachments.desc: Save attachment files to disk and link them in conversations (uses 'best effort' strategy)

handle_missing.name: Handle missing attachments
handle_missing.desc: When attachments are missing from exports, create informative notes instead of skipping them

show_details.name: Show attachment details in reports
show_details.desc: Include detailed attachment processing statistics in import reports

info_box.title: üìé About Attachment Handling
info_box.best_effort: Best Effort Strategy: Files found in exports are extracted and linked; missing files get informative notes.
info_box.platform_diff: Platform Differences: ChatGPT exports may not include all attachments, especially from older conversations.
info_box.organization: Simple Organization: Files organized as attachments/provider/category/ (e.g., attachments/chatgpt/images/).
info_box.sync_tip: Sync Tip: Consider excluding the attachment folder from sync to avoid uploading large files.
info_box.tip: üí° Tip: Enable 'Show attachment details' to see exactly which files were found, missing, or failed during import.

migrations.description_manual: Manual Operations: Optional upgrade operations that can be run when convenient.
migrations.description_automatic: Automatic operations (like removing old data) run automatically during upgrade and are not shown here.

no_migrations.title: No manual operations available
no_migrations.desc: All upgrade operations have been completed automatically.

tooltips.cannot_run: Prerequisites not met for this operation

resources.name: üìö Resources
resources.desc: Documentation, release notes, and community links

migration_section.title: üîÑ Migration Required
migration_section.message: The following tasks will run automatically to upgrade your data to v1.3.0:

tasks.folder_settings: ‚úì Migrate folder settings to new structure
tasks.reports: ‚úì Move Reports folder to proper location

migration_section.estimate: This will take a few seconds.

folder_migration.title: Move Existing Files?
folder_migration.message_intro: You are changing the {{folder_type}} folder location:
folder_migration.question: Do you want to move existing files to the new location?

link_updates.title: üîó Link Updates:
link_updates.attachments_text: Moving attachments will also update all conversation notes that reference them.
link_updates.conversations_text: Moving conversations will also update all reports and attachments that reference them.

warning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important:
warning.text: If you choose 'No', existing files will remain in the old location and will not be impacted by future updates.

buttons.keep: No, keep files in old location
buttons.move_with_links: Yes, move files and update links

progress.step_moved_detail: {{moved}} files moved, {{skipped}} skipped. Preparing to update links...

result_dialog.title: Folder Migration Result
result_dialog.explanation: Files that already existed in the destination were not overwritten to preserve your data.

error_target_not_empty.title: Target Folder Not Empty
error_target_not_empty.message:
The folder "{{path}}" already contains files.

To change the folder location:
‚Ä¢ Move existing files manually in Obsidian, OR
‚Ä¢ Choose an empty folder or create a new one

error_migration_failed.title: Migration Failed
error_migration_failed.message_links: Failed to move files or update links: {{error}}

notices.select_parent_first: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please select a parent folder first
notices.invalid_name: ‚ùå Invalid folder name: contains illegal characters

configure_folder_dialog.title: üéâ Nexus AI Chat Importer v1.3.0
configure_folder_dialog.description: In version 1.3.0, you can specify a folder for Reports. We will move existing reports to {{folder}}, or you can select your preferred folder below.
configure_folder_dialog.note: Note: The folder cannot be inside Conversations or Attachments.

welcome.title: Nexus AI Chat Importer {{version}}
welcome.heading: Thank you for installing Nexus AI Chat Importer!
welcome.description: Import and manage your ChatGPT, Claude, and Le Chat conversations directly in your Obsidian vault.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Learn how to use the plugin

report_issues.title: Report Issues
report_issues.description: Found a bug? Let us know

notices.import_no_new: No new or updated conversations found. All conversations are already up to date.
notices.import_error_file: Error processing {{filename}}. Check console for details.
notices.import_no_zip_gemini: Please select at least one Gemini Takeout ZIP file (plus optional JSON index from the extension).
notices.import_no_zip: Please select at least one ZIP export file.
notices.import_gemini_json_failed: Failed to read Gemini index JSON. Continuing without index.
notices.report_failed: Failed to create log file. Check console for details.
notices.attachment_map_failed: Failed to build attachment map. Check console for details.
notices.ribbon_tooltip: Nexus AI Chat Importer - Import new file

support_box.default_message_emphasis: I'm working on Nexus projects full-time while unemployed and dealing with health issues.
support_box.default_message: If this plugin makes your life easier, a donation would mean the world to me and help keep them alive.
support_box.reality_check: Thank you! Thousands of hours of work have gone into these plugins, and every donation helps me keep improving them while managing ongoing health issues. If this plugin makes your life easier, please consider supporting me.
